summary: Website for SMART DESK computer training institute (Hyderabad) with full course listings and contact/enquiry section, updated to use/display the new website domain www.smartdesk7.com, and include a pamphlet and additional image on the website.
architectural_notes: Public contact info to display: phones (9966116082, 9966116087, 7095997081) and email (smartdesk007@gmail.com).
Institute address to display: South Kamala Nagar, ECIL, Opp ECIL Bus Stop, Above Apollo Pharmacy Building, 1st Floor, Hyderabad, Telangana 500062.
Official website domain to display/use: www.smartdesk7.com

existing_features.title: Create a multi-page institute website for the computer training institute named “SMART DESK” with clear navigation and sections for Home, Courses, About/Institute, and Contact/Enquiry.

Add institute details and display them on relevant pages: address/location and contact details (phone numbers and email). Address to use: “South Kamala Nagar, ECIL, Opp ECIL Bus stop, Above Appolo Pharmacy Building, 1st Floor, Hyderabad, Telangana 500062”. Phone numbers to display: 9966116082, 9966116087, 7095997081. Email to display: smartdesk007@gmail.com.

Implement a full course catalog page that organizes courses into categories and displays course cards/lists. Include at minimum these categories and example items from the user: Basic computer courses (DCA, ADCA, MS-OFFICE, Data Entry, Typing, Spoken English), Programming (Programming all courses), Designing (Photoshop, Corel Draw, Graphic Design, Page Maker DTP, AutoCAD, Web Design, HTML, CSS).

Add a Contact/Enquiry form that allows prospective students to submit enquiries. The form must collect at least: name, phone number, email (optional if phone is provided), selected course/category (optional), and message. Submissions should be stored in the Motoko backend for later retrieval.

Define and apply a coherent visual theme for SMART DESK across the site (colors, typography, spacing, and components) that feels modern and trustworthy for a computer training institute. Avoid a blue/purple default palette; use a distinct, consistent style.
Add generated static images (logo and hero banner) to the project and use them in the UI (stored under frontend/public/assets/generated).

Add the official SMART DESK website link "www.smartdesk.in" to the shared institute details content and display it as a clickable external link (opens in a new tab) anywhere the institute contact details are shown (at minimum: Site Footer and Contact page).

Update the institute website domain everywhere it is displayed/linked to use exactly "www.smartdesk7.com" (replacing the previous value "www.smartdesk.in") using the centralized institute details content so the footer and Contact page website link update consistently.

Add the two user-uploaded images ("SDPH-1.jpg" pamphlet and "1000_F_755840623_3JuwWAI0IdvB5xOmCIqvUZmPyfLoHd3M-1.jpg") into the frontend as static assets and display them on the website in a dedicated section on the Home page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a full course-listing website for SMART DESK computer training institute
Add Contact/Enquiry section (contact form) and display phone numbers and email
Include institute address/location details on the website
Add course catalog organized by categories (basic computer, programming, designing, etc.)
Update displayed/linked website domain to www.smartdesk7.com (replace www.smartdesk.in)
Add the provided pamphlet and image to the website (upload/store assets and display them on relevant pages)
